CustomField.formula: IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Hungary", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),1, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Belgium-FR", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),3, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Belgium-NL", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),3, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Netherlands", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),6, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Poland", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),8, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-FR", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),10, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-DE", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),10, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-IT", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),10 ,0))))))))
CustomField.label: NVM CLID1
